content: knit to last 2 sts slip last 2 sts purlwise wyif repeat row 3 and row 4 another 10 times row 5-24 repeat row 1-24 until you have just enough yarn to work the cast off edge or until you re happy with the size you have reached for example i started the cast off edge once my shawl reached a width of 150-160 cm 59-63 inch along the longest side of the shawl pre-blocking tip if you ve lost count of your row number to determine whether it s time to knit another row 1 observe your work and count how many garter bump row you have created since your last eyelet row if you count 12 of them it means it s time to starting again with row 1 finish your shawl with a 2-stitch i-cord bind off refer to this video tutorial if you d like ● cast on 2 stitches on the left needle using the knitted cast on method ● repeat k1 k2tog tbl slide 2 sts back to the left needle until 2 stitches remain ● k2tog tbl cut yarn pull yarn through last stitch weave in all ends 4
